DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety HE10 eye drop patient moderate severe dry eye syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety HE10 Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare efficacy safety HE10 Restasis patient moderate severe dry eye syndrome multi-center , double-blind , randomize , active comparator-controlled , parallel design , non-inferiority Phase III clinical trial .
